CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Party__r.Document_Type__c, 'Alt'), AND( Party__r.Legal_Entity_Type__c == 'Individual', ISPICKVAL(Document_Type__c, 'Alt'), Employment_Information__c != NULL ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Accountant_ABN_Search_Conducted__c, 'No'), ISPICKVAL(Accountant_ABN_Search_Conducted__c, '') ), FALSE )
CustomField.label: Accntnt ABN Search Condctd Warning Check
